## action.ActionContext interface

Helper information for an [action.Action](./cloud.action.action.md) component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ActionContext 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [buildData](./cloud.action.actioncontext.builddata.md) | <code>BuildData</code> | Various pieces of data about the current element and build cycle |
|  [dataDir](./cloud.action.actioncontext.datadir.md) | <code>string</code> | A location to put files that need to be persisted as state |
|  [logger](./cloud.action.actioncontext.logger.md) | <code>MessageLogger</code> | Interface to use for logging messages. Prefer to using stderr or stdout |
